this_title: National Geographic: Eye of the Leopard
introduction: 2007 EMMY AWARD WINNEROUTSTANDING SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND NATURE PROGRAMMINGEye of the Leopard takes us on an enthralling journey deep into the rarely seen lives of leopards. Award-winning filmmakers, Dereck and Beverly Joubert capture a remarkably intimate and gripping story of a leopard’s survival in wild, unspoiled Africa over a period of three years.It’s a journey of bir...
